data.message: I keep asking and getting NO response....how can I extend events?? Why do you respond to "I love Facebook" comments, but not to questions?

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Cassie. We currently don't offer this feature. However, you do have the option to edit your event. To learn how, please visit our Help Center here: https://www.facebook.com/help/197057967039592. In addition, we're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If this is an option that you'd like to see, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Hailey
I get no help when I can't remember my Facebook password.  What can I do?
